question:
For the past year, you have been a member of a local club. Now you want to discontinue your membership. Write a letter to the manager. In your letter-

 * state what type of membership you have and how much you have paid for it? * explain how you have benefited from the club * give reasons on why you want to leave
text: I hope this letter finds you in good health. I am writing to you in connection with the discontinuation of the club membership.

Currently, I am having an annual membership vide Receipt No 450 and I renewed it a month before. For the purpose of renewal, I had paid an advance amount of Rs. 20,000/- after availing of the discount of Rs. 4,000/- in total.

I was using all the amenities provided by the club which benefited me a lot. Gymnasium service helped me to reduce my body weight and enables me to maintain my health. Earlier I was suffering from obesity, however, now I get rid of this disease due to regular exercise.

Although I enjoyed all the services rendered by the club yet I want to cancel my membership because of my transfer to another city. Thus, It would be really commendable if you could please process the cancellation and refund the balance at the earliest.
Looking forward to hearing a positive and speedy action from your side.
